plot: Examines life on the street for people as they deal with addictions and finding food while battling poverty and the cold.
title: Monks of Despair
plot_es: Examines life on the street for people as they deal with addictions and finding food while battling poverty and the cold.
plot_en: Examines life on the street for people as they deal with addictions and finding food while battling poverty and the cold.
